nodes.text: Star Wars Adventures 31 is the thirty-first, penultimate issue of the canon comic book anthology series Star Wars Adventures. It is comprised of the stories "Squad Goals," by Michael Moreci, and "The Lost Stories, Part 2," by Cavan Scott. The issue was published on March 18, 2020 by IDW Publishing.
Learn more about the heroes and villains of The Rise of Skywalker! In this issue, the spotlight falls on Rey!
